I got banned permanently for trolling in those two games.. I am not really a toxic person, but in fact a team player.. From time to time I do tend to troll in rare and very rare cases such as this one.. I have been chat restricted twice with both of them being 10 games each.. I never had been suspended ever. Instead they considered this to be insanely offensive and decided to permanently banned my account?? I was not aware that this was going to happen to my account. I never knew a game will take such desperate measures to get someone banned.. I wasn't even being extremely toxic or racist.. I think this punishment is extremely harsh overall. Why didn't they suspend my account to 14 days as most people mentioned when I was reading other Banned accounts on the forums.. I'm not a league of legends veterans and have only played a few months. I honestly wish I can get my account back. I will probably never ever troll in this game ever again. Knowing that my account will ever cease to exist. Also the guys I was facing with, were also having a good time talking shit back to me. While making me look like an idiot.. I didn't mind it at all.. I honestly thought we were all having fun on a NORMAL game.. I know those few games make me look like an asshole, but clearly the people who actually know me.. Know me as a very nice person. Is it possible to get my account back.. This is extremely harsh punishment.. I instantly got permanently banned.. Obviously, I will learn from now on to mute anyone and never chat in an aggressive or provoking manner. I never meant anything that I said in those chats.. I was never expecting someone to take what I said seriously to the point where I hurt them emotionally.. In fact I was getting trolled back.. Which was fine by me in those games. I don't know how to contact the support desk. Can anyone give me a link so I can try to get my account back.. I obviously know now, that you have to take this game very seriously and ignore everyone else.  That's all I have to say.. 

I just don't understand why I got instantly PERMANENT BANNED. A suspension would had been more logical. I didn't get any warning emails as others got. I was only chat restricted twice with a 10 game restriction.. Then after that I got permanently banned?? How is that fair? can anyone explain please?

replies.body:
Repeated use of racial/homophobic slurs is one of those offenses that can result in skipping punishment tiers. If it wasn't so frequent it may have been a 14 day ban, but this seems like a pretty regular occurrence. That kind of behavior is not tolerated.

If you want to speak to player support, hit up the **Support** link on the top of this page and go to **Submit a Request** to send a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

This.

Please, **PLEASE** don't say "Toxicity" or "Volume of reports" because even your own people have told me my toxicity was not worthy of a zero-to-permaban punishment. That was the whole reason the permaban was rescinded, that I was NOT toxic enough to merit such an extreme punishment.

I don't think I'm being unreasonable with wanting to know these things. I will accept a permaban even right now if that is the price I must pay..... but I want to know the answers to these  fairly reasonable questions.

Time number .. 10?

You were never hit with a perma-ban. You were hit with a 'shield' ban. Your account was locked until you wrote in to protect your account in case your behavior was a result of an account compromise. It wasn't. So, you received a 14-day ban.

> I don't think I'm being unreasonable with wanting to know these things.

How many times have I explained it to you, in the same way? I'm being very clear. I have no idea what it is you want.

I really **really** don't want to support DD in this argument... but are there plans to make the nature of such shield bans more obvious?

I mean... what if, worst case, somebody thinks they were actually hit with a permaban, and they never write in because they believe they deserved a permaban for their toxicity? Then you would have effectively permabanned somebody that neither deserved it for toxicity, nor needed it for account protection.
